1. React isn’t just for Browser environment, thus might not have HTMLElement at all virtual dom only uses JavaScript objects, which is possible to be used anywhere, as long as JavaScript is running. React and ReactDOM are two packages, HTMLElement is only available in ReactDOM package.

Native React is for iOS/Android, ink is for console project.

  1. virtual dom isn’t “fast”. The fastest way of rendering will always be manipulating the DOM directly (and only manipulate the necessary part) (probably using document.createDocumentFragment if possible)

/**
 * Webpack by default support dynamic import (a.k.a. Code Splitting)
 * https://wanago.io/2018/08/20/webpack-4-course-part-eight-dynamic-imports-with-prefetch-and-preload/
 */
import('module-path-here' /* webpackPrefetch: true */ /* webpackChunkName: "name" */)

prefetch 和 preload 都是有的，浏览器的实现效果略有不同，按需使用。

不同的配置可以并列书写。

注释写在字符串的前面或者后面都没有问题。
